---
title: "Barrier Dates"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
barriers <- read.csv("barrierDates.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
barriersYear <- barriers %>%
  filter(is.na(year) == FALSE) %>%
  filter(year > 1958) %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) 

barriersYear$countTot <- cumsum(barriersYear$count)

barriersPlot <- barriersYear %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year)) +
    geom_line(aes(y = count, colour = "Per Year")) + 
    geom_line(aes(y = countTot, colour = "Cumulative")) +
    labs(title = "Street Barriers in St. Louis",
         subtitle = "Installations per Year and Cumulatively",
         x = "Year",
         y = "Count",
         colour = "")

barriersPlot

ggsave(barriersPlot, file = "barriersPlot.png")
```
